title: Sticky Messages
longDescription:
98% of People Who Visit Your Site Never Convert. Instantly boost leads and grow revenue with the most intuitive conversion optimization toolkit in the world Zero-line of code !!


Whether you need to grow your email list, capture abandoned carts or just make small announcements use one of pre-made templates and customize it to your liking.

Use our Page-level Targeting along with exit-intent trigger, scroll-trigger or time-activated trigger to show the right the messages to the right users at the right time and the right location

Easily connect with your preferred email service provider such mailchimp and Constant Contact
author: Assim Addous

products.title: Basic
products.longDescription:
- Three Customizable Templates
- Mailchimp and Constantcontact integration
- Page-level targeting
- Time trigger
- Exit-Intent trigger
- Scroll trigger

products.title: Pro
products.longDescription:
- Three Customizable Templates
- Mailchimp and Constantcontact integration
- Page-level targeting
- Time trigger
- Exit-Intent trigger
- Scroll trigger

proposedApp.title: Sticky Messages
proposedApp.longDescription:
98% of People Who Visit Your Site Never Convert. Instantly boost leads and grow revenue with the most intuitive conversion optimization toolkit in the world Zero-line of code !!


Whether you need to grow your email list, capture abandoned carts or just make small announcements use one of pre-made templates and customize it to your liking.

Use our Page-level Targeting along with exit-intent trigger, scroll-trigger or time-activated trigger to show the right the messages to the right users at the right time and the right location

Easily connect with your preferred email service provider such mailchimp and Constant Contact
proposedApp.author: Assim Addous
